top.title: At least eight killed after car explodes near Delhi's Red Fort
top.summary: Twenty more were injured in the blast, the cause of which is still unknown, authorities say.

top.title: US Senate to debate deal to end longest shutdown after overnight breakthrough
top.summary: The measure signals a major breakthrough but the deal still needs to get over more hurdles in Congress.

top.title: Former French president Sarkozy released from prison after three weeks
top.summary: The former French president was jailed in October for conspiring to fund his election campaign with money from late Libyan dictator Muammar Gaddafi.

top.title: A jailed hacking kingpin reveals all about the gang that left a trail of destruction
top.summary: One of the world's most prominent cyber-criminals speaks to the BBC in an exclusive interview.

top.title: Dundee and US surgeons achieve world-first stroke surgery using robot
top.summary: A Dundee professor carried out the first remote thrombectomy on a human cadaver.

top.title: China exempts chips used by carmakers from export curbs
top.summary: The block on exports of the company's chips had raised fears that European car production would be hit.
